articles.title: Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King, Great Queen Send Large Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on Feb. 13 with the approach of the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Upon the authorization by the king and the great queen, a delegation of the Cambodian Ministry of Royal Palace led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister for Royal Palace, laid the floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: ITF President Arrives
articles.content:
ITF President Arrives
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Ri Yong Son, president of the International Taekwon-Do Federation (ITF) who doubles as chairman of the International Martial Arts Games Committee, and his party arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Nepalese Political Party Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
Nepalese Political Party Delegation Leaves
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal headed by Chairman of its Central Committee Kamal Prasad Chaulagain left for home Saturday after visiting the DPRK on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in China Visits 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in China Visits 22nd Kimjongilia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The visiting delegation of the General Association of Koreans in China led by First Vice-Chairman Choe Su Bong Saturday visited the venue of the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival.
					 The delegation members looked around the venue of the festival praising the great man with deep emotion.
					
					 It also visited the Korean Revolution Museum.

articles.title: Juche Musical Art Development House Opens
articles.content:
Juche Music and Art Development House Opens
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Juche Music and Art Development House has been wonderfully built at the Mansudae Art Theatre on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 This is a treasure-house of socialist Korea's music and art as it comprehensively and intuitively showcases the history of the revolutionary music and art of Korea that has made brilliant development century after century and decade after decade since the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle. On display there are famous pieces, including the songs praising the leaders significantly recorded in the protracted course of the Korean revolution which started and has advanced victoriously with songs, and data on the creative and performing activities of creators and artistes.
					
					 Its opening ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, and Pak Kwang Ho, Ri Su Yong, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Kim Yong Chol, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Dok, Ri Man Gon and other cadres of the WPK Central Committee, officials, creators and artistes in the field of literature and arts and officials and employees of the house.
					
					 Pak Kwang Ho, Politburo member and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 He said that the house is a great treasure-house of music and art reflective of the great feats performed by the peerlessly great men in the music and art field.
					
					 The house is a brilliant fruition of the noble intention and energetic guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un to firmly defend and eternally glorify the music and art leadership feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, he said.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the participants looked round the house.
					
					 Seen before the color statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il at the central hall of the house was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, chairman of the Workers' Party of Korea, chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 They placed floral baskets and bouquets before the color statues of the great leaders and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Art Performance Celebrates Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Art Performance Celebrates Day of Shining Star
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- An art performance celebrating the Day of the Shining Star was given at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Friday.
					 Enjoying it were senior party and government officials, the chairman of a friendly party, officials of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, armed forces organs, the Cabinet, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons and women of merit from Jagang Province and officials of institutions and industrial establishments, labor innovators and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 Among the audience were congratulatory groups and delegations of overseas compatriots including a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan.
					
					 Present on invitation were representatives of foreign embassies and international organizations here and their spouses, military attaches and their spouses and other foreign guests.
					
					 The numbers of the performance included female chorus "Snow-covered Native Home", male solo and female pangchang "Tell, O Road of Songun" and female sextet and chorus "We Call You Father".
					
					 The performers sang high praises of the revolutionary life and feats of leader Kim Jong Il who laid an eternal foundation for prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea and happiness of posterity by making the forced march of field guidance day and night with his iron will, out of the high sense of obligations before the country and the revolution.
					
					 Touching the heartstrings of the audience were female solo and pangchang "Thinking of the General" and female chorus "Song of Love for People", which represent the deep yearning for Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Mixed duet and chorus "Cheers of the People" and chorus "Song of Socialist Advance" marked the climax of the performance, pieces that sang of the joy and happiness of the Korean people dynamically advancing toward the final victory of socialist cause under the guidance of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Samjiyon Orchestra Gives Performance
articles.content:
Samjiyon Orchestra Gives Performance
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the Samjiyon Orchestra, which successfully finished congratulatory performances to congratulate the 23rd Winter Olympics, at the Mansudae Art Theatre on Friday. 
					 The performance was enjoyed by Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, and cadres of the C.C., WPK and officials, creators and artists in the field of art.
					
					 Put on the stage were diverse pieces including female chorus "Fly High, Doves" and light music "My Country Is Best". 
					
					 The performers well showed the aspiration of our people for making the opportunity of reconciliation and unity provided by the noble patriotism and great decision of the peerlessly great man produce a good fruition with fresh songs and enthusiastic and high artistic skills. 
					
					 The performance was acclaimed by the audience as they represented the musical emotion of the Korean nation.
					
					 In orchestra "Dear Melodies" the performers successfully played world famous songs including "Arirang". They sang south Korean songs which deeply impressed south Korean people.

articles.title: Chinese and Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Chinese and Koreans in China Visit Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The Chinese guests and Koreans in China who participated in the 22nd Kimjongilia Festival visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 At the old home in Mangyongdae, they looked round historic relics, being briefed on the revolutionary history of the President and careers of his family members.
					
					 They also toured the Korean Revolution Museum, the Monument to Party Founding, the Natural History Museum, etc.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Meets Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, met and had a talk with the art troupe of Koreans in Japan giving a music and dance performance in celebration of the Day of the Shining Star at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday.
					 Attending it were Ko Tok U, chairman of the Nishi Tokyo Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan who is leading the congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, and officials concerned.

articles.title: Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance for Guests of Honor
articles.content:
Art Troupe of Koreans in Japan Gives Performance for Guests of Honor
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- The art troupe of Koreans in Japan gave a music and dance performance at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Saturday to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Invited to the performance were Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Im Chol Ung, vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kim Yong Dae, chairman of the C.C., the Korean Social Democratic Party, officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.
					
					 Among the audience were a congratulatory group of Koreans in Japan, delegations of overseas Koreans and compatriots.
					
					 The numbers of the performance, which began with prologue "We Extend Glory to General", included mixed duet "Cantata to General Kim Jong Il" and "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass".
					
					 The performers highly praised the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il who led the socialist cause of Juche to ever-victory and laid an eternal foundation for prosperity of Kim Il Sung's Korea.
					
					 The audience gave thunderous applauses when the numbers including Jangsaenap solo "Tondollari of Reunification" reflecting the ardent desire of the fellow countrymen for reunification and national flavor were put on the stage.
					
					 Numbers including male solo "The Country Is the Marshal" revved up the atmosphere of the performance which represented high proud of the upholding respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.

articles.title: DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
articles.content:
DPRK People Enjoy Lunar New Year's Day
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- People in the DPRK greeted Lunar New Year's Day.
					 On this occasion, servicepersons, working people and youth and schoolchildren visit the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and mosaics picturing their smiling images on Mansu Hill and other parts of the country to pay tribute to them.
					
					 It is a custom of the Korean nation to put up New Year's greetings to elders ahead of others in the morning.
					
					 Jon Kum Ok, a resident in Rangnang District, Pyongyang, told KCNA that she prepared rice dumpling soup, steamed rice-cake and fruit punch for families and relatives. 
					
					 Okryu Restaurant, Chongryu Restaurant and other public catering establishments in Pyongyang are crowded with people enjoying Lunar New Year's Day.
					
					 And colorful art performances are given in different parts of the country, adding a festive mood.
					
					 Seen at Kim Il Sung Square in Pyongyang and other parts of the country are schoolchildren playing folk games like Taekwon-Do, kite-flying, top spinning, shuttlecock and rope-skipping.

articles.title: Figure-Skating Festival Closes
articles.content:
Figure-Skating Festival Closes
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A figure-skating festival to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il closed with due ceremony at the Ice Rink Saturday.
					 Present at the closing ceremony were officials concerned, working people, youth and students.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony a demonstration performance was given.

articles.title: Japan-DPRK Friendship New Year Meeting Takes Place
articles.content:
Japan-DPRK Friendship New Year Meeting Takes Place
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- A Japan-DPRK friendship New Year meeting took place in Tokyo on Feb. 8 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Present at the meeting were Japanese personages of various strata including Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, Shingo Kanemaru, adviser to the Tokyo-Pyongyang Rainbow Bridge, Tokuji Yanagisawa, chief director of the Japan-Korea Cultural Interchange Association, and Akihiro Harada, co-representative of the Japanese side of the Fact－Finding Group for the Probe into the Truth about the Forcible Drafting of Koreans, Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), and officials of Chongryon.
					
					 Fumihiro Himori and Nam Sung U made speeches at the meeting.
					
					 They said that Kim Jong Il firmly defended the country's sovereignty and dignity under the unfurled banner of independence, Songun and socialism during the days of unprecedented and severe trials and provided the firm foundation for building a powerful socialist country.
					
					 They referred to the fact that the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un evoked lively response from the international society and a dramatic turn is being made in the north-south relations.
					
					 They disclosed that the Japanese authorities are working hard to meanly isolate and pressurize the DPRK while chilling the climate of improving the inter-Korean relations, and called upon the Koreans in Japan and Japanese people to boost exchange and solidarity.

articles.title: Pence Ridiculed
articles.content:
Pence Ridiculed
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers of the DPRK on Saturday carry a signed commentary deriding U.S. Vice-President Pence.
					 Noting that Pence did not take his place wherever he went during his south Korea visit, being a common object of hatred, the commentary says:
					
					 Notably when our high-level delegation came up to him, he dared not look at it.
					
					 On the afternoon of Feb. 9 he was late at the pre-opening reception as he had a photo session with Japanese Prime Minister Abe and in less than five minutes after his appearance at the event stealthily disappeared not listening to the congratulatory speech.
					
					 At the opening ceremony of the Winter Olympics, too, he took the seat just before our delegation but did not dare turn his eyes towards it.
					
					 His behavior reminded one of a criminal wishing to sink through the floor.
					
					 Recalling that Pence said he didn't require any contact with the north Korean delegation and he asked the south side authorities to fix schedule not to encounter it, the commentary goes on:
					
					 In this regard, the DPRK made clear its stand that it has never begged the U.S. for dialogue and will never do so in the future, too, that the DPRK has no intention to meet with the U.S. side during the visit to south Korea and that it doesn't want to use the sports festival such as the Winter Olympics as a political leverage nor feel the necessity.
					
					 After all, Pence, a backseat driver, had to go back to his den after exposing himself to public disgrace.
					
					 As seen in Pence's recent tour of south Korea the harder the Trump group resorts to such foolish acts, the more vividly the miserable face of the beleaguered U.S. is laid bare.
					
					 If Trump and his group want to avoid more disgrace and shame before eyes of the world, they had better reflect on all their crimes against the DPRK and honestly regret for having sent such human scum as Pence to the gathering of peace.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Iran
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Iran
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Making Selfless, Devoted Efforts for the Good of the People Is the Mode of Existence and Source of Invincible Might of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet at the Hadian Publishing House of Iran.
					 The work, published on October 10, Juche 104 (2015), says that the history of the WPK is a proud course in which it has led the Korean revolution to victory, being responsible for the people's destiny under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 A book-releasing ceremony took place at the publishing house on Jan. 31.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Lauded in Myanmar
Pyongyang, February 17 (KCNA) -- Tha Win, secretary of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar who is chairman of the preparatory committee of Myanmar for celebrating the 76th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, issued a statement on Feb. 1 with the approach of his birth anniversary (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 He paid the highest tribute to Kim Jong Il who made an immortal contribution to the accomplishment of the human cause of independence.
					
					 He said in his statement that Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the powerful party which defends the interests of the people, enjoying their support and trust.
					
					 He smashed the imperialists' moves for stifling the DPRK with his unique Songun politics, defended the country's sovereignty and security and peace on the Korean Peninsula and ushered in a fresh era of building a powerful socialist country, Tha Win noted, and went on:
					
					 His exploits are shining as the precious legacy guaranteeing the final victory in the DPRK.
					
					 His august name and great exploits will be eternally kept in the minds of the progressives.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion artistica "Mi pais donde se realiza el anhelo del General"
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion artistica "Mi pais donde se realiza el anhelo del General"
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 16 en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este la funcion artistica "Mi pais donde se realiza el anhelo del General" en homenaje al Dia de la Estrella Luz, natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il.
					Entre el publico se distinguian los funcionarios responsables del partido y el gobierno, el presidente del partido amigo, los funcionarios del CC del PTC, las instituciones de las fuerzas armadas, el Consejo de Ministros, las entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC, las mujeres ameritadas de la provincia de Jagang, los funcionarios, los innovadores laborales y los trabajadores de las organizaciones, las fabricas y las empresas de esta capital. 
					
					Tambien, figuraban los grupos de felicitacion y delegaciones de coreanos residentes en ultramar incluso el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, y los compatriotas que permanecen en la patria. 
					
					Fueron invitados los matrimonios de representantes diplomaticos y de organizaciones internacionales y los de agregados militares, acreditados en Corea, y otros huespedes extranjeros.
					
					En la escena se presentaron el coro femenino "Casa natal cubierta de copos de nieve", el solo masculino y pangchang femenino "Cuentalo, el camino del Songun" y otras piezas de diferentes generos.
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron la vida y proezas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien sento la solida base para la prosperidad eterna de la Corea del Sol y la felicidad de las generaciones venideras realizando incesantes direcciones en el terreno con la mision responsable asumida ante la patria y la revolucion y con la voluntad de acero. 
					
					El solo y pangchang femeninos "Anoranza al General" y el coro femenino "Cancion de amor por el pueblo" aumentaron la anoranza al Padre del pueblo.
					
					La funcion llego al climax con el duo mixto y coro "Jubilo del pueblo" y el coro "Cancion de la marcha del socialismo" que describieron el aspecto alegre y feliz del pueblo coreano que bajo la guia del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un, marcha con vigor hacia la victoria final de la causa socialista.

articles.title: Efectuada funcion de regreso de Orquesta Samjiyon
articles.content:
Efectuada funcion de regreso de Orquesta Samjiyon
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar la vispera en el Teatro de Arte Mansudae la funcion de regreso de la Orquesta Samjiyon que ofrecio con exito la funcion para felicitar los XXIII Juegos Olimpicos Invernales.
					Vieron la funcion Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del CC del PTC, y otros cuadros del CC del PTC y los funcionarios, creadores y artistas del dominio artistico.
					
					Se presentaron en la escena el coro femenino "Vuela alto, paloma", la musica ligera "Es mejor mi pais" y otras piezas.
					
					Los ejecutantes demostraron con las melodias de nueva forma, la interpretacion apasionada y diestra y la elevada habilidad artistica la aspiracion del pueblo coreano de hacer fructificar la oportunidad de reconciliacion y la unidad nacionales preparada gracias al noble amor a la nacion y la gran decision patriotica del gran hombre sin igual.
					
					Arrancaron efusivas ovaciones de los espectadores las piezas que reflejan el sentimiento musical de la nacion coreana inteligente que tiene larga historia y cultura de cinco milenios.
					
					En la musica orquestal "Melodias intimas", los artistas interpretaron perfectamente "Arirang" y otras canciones de fama mundial y una serie de las surcoreanas que dieron profunda impresion a la poblacion surcoreana.

articles.title: Arriban a Pyongyang el presidente de la ITF y su comitiva
articles.content:
Arriban a Pyongyang el presidente de la ITF y su comitiva
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Arribaron hoy a esta capital el presidente de la Federacion Internacional de Taekwondo (ITF en ingles) y del Comite Internacional de Juegos de Artes Marciales (CIJAM), Ri Yong Son, y su comitiva.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de artistas coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam se reune con grupo de artistas coreanos residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- El miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, departio el dia 17 en un ambiente fraternal con el grupo de artistas coreanos residentes en Japon, que ofrece en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang su funcion musical y coreografica en homenaje al Dia de la Estrella Luz. 
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el presidente de la Direccion de Nishi Tokyo de la Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon, Ko Tok U, quien preside el grupo de felicitacion de los coreanos residentes en Japon, y los funcionarios interesados.

articles.title: Ofrecida funcion de invitacion del grupo artistico de coreanos residentes en Japon
articles.content:
Ofrecida funcion de invitacion del grupo artistico de coreanos residentes en Japon
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Con motivo del natalicio del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, tuvo lugar el dia 17 en el capitalino Gran Teatro de Pyongyang la funcion musical y coreografica del grupo artistico de coreanos residentes en Japon "Sera eterna la luz primaveral de febrero".
					Fueron invitados Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, el vicepremier Im Chol Ung, Kim Yong Dae, presidente del Comite Central del Partido Social-Democrata de Corea, los funcionarios de los ministerios y los organos centrales y los trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					La vieron tambien el grupo de felicitacion de coreanos residentes en Japon, las delegaciones de los coreanos ultramarinos y los compatriotas.
					
					En la escena de la funcion iniciada con el prologo "Rendimos gloria al General", se presentaron el duo mixto "Al General Kim Jong Il" y "Mar de manzanas al pie del monte Chol", el solo de Sohaegum (instrumento musical coreano) y baile "Flor que amo", etc.
					
					Los ejecutantes alabaron fervientemente la vida y hazanas revolucionarias del Dirigente quien condujo a la victoria la causa socialista del Juche y asento la base eterna para la prosperidad eterna de la Corea del Sol.
					
					Arrancaron la efusiva ovacion de los espectadores las obras de matiz nacional y las otras que reflejan la aspiracion de los coreanos de la reunificacion.
					
					Llevaron al climax el ambiente de la funcion el solo masculino "Patria es el Mariscal" y la cancion y la danza para el solo de Janggo "Jubilo de la nacion", que cantaron en tono patetico el orgullo nacional de haber enaltecido al Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Periodicos coreanos se burlan del aspecto miserable de Pence
articles.content:
Periodicos coreanos se burlan del aspecto miserable de Pence
Pyongyang, 17 de febrero (ACNC) -- Los periodicos centrales de Corea insertaron el dia 17 el comentario de Jong Hyon que se burla del aspecto miserable del vicepresidente estadounidense Pence.
					El comentario ironiza que durante su reciente visita al Sur de Corea, Pence fue objeto de las miradas feroces en todos los lugares y andaba muy aislado.
					
					En particular, no se atrevio a mirar cara a cara a la delegacion de alto rango de la RPDC que pasaba muy cerca de si mismo, apunta el comentarista y continua:
					
					En la ceremonia de bienvenida a las personalidades extranjeras efectuada por la tarde del dia 9 en Phyongchang en visperas del acto inaugural de la Olimpiada, Pence aparecio con tardanza al prologar el tiempo tomando la fotografia junto a Abe y se desaparecio en menos de 5 minutos sin escuchar el discurso de felicitacion.
					
					En la ceremonia inaugural del evento deportivo, el se sento delante de la delegacion de la RPDC, pero nunca se atrevio a volver la mirada hacia nuestra delegacion.
					
					Pence habia dicho que "no pidio ningun tipo de contacto con la delegacion norcoreana" y "exigio a las autoridades surcoreanas que eviten la concurrencia con ella". 
					
					Al respecto, la RPDC declaro claramente la posicion de que nunca le ha suplicado el dialogo a EE.UU. y tampoco lo hara en el futuro, no tiene el deseo de encontrar con la parte norteamericana durante la visita al Sur de Corea y no quiere utilizar ese festival deportivo como espacio politico ni se siente la necesidad de hacerlo.
					
					Al fin, Pence, avergonzado por su accion absurda, escapo precipitadamente a su pais.
					
					Como mostro la visita de Pence al Sur de Corea, cuanto mas la banda de Trump recurra a la locura imprudente, tanto mas se revelera su figura miserable de EE.UU.
					
					Si quieren evitar la mayor deshonra en la cara del mundo, Trump y sus compinches deberan reflexionarse de todos sus crimenes cometidos contra nuestro pueblo y arrepentirse de su error de haber enviado al lugar de paz la escoria humana como Pence.
